emailTemplate:derivRedSlashHeaderwithGre.description: Generate email template with red slash header and a greybox in the content section
emailTemplate:derivRedSlashHeaderwithGre.prompt: Hey, please help to create an HTML email template based on the existing files (deriv-red-slash-header.html and footer-partner.html). Create a complete HTML email template that combines the header and footer with a content section. Write this in email-template.html file. Add a greybox as well in the content section - follow the exact codes in deriv-red-slash-header.mdc

emailTemplate:derivRedSlashHeaderwithGre.description: Generate email template with red slash header and a greybox in the content section, together with a CTA button
emailTemplate:derivRedSlashHeaderwithGre.prompt: Hey, please help to create an HTML email template based on the existing files (deriv-red-slash-header.html and footer-partner.html). Create a complete HTML email template that combines the header and footer with a content section. Write this in email-template.html file. Add a greybox as well in the content section - follow the exact codes in deriv-red-slash-header.mdc and add CTA button under the greybox

emailTemplate:derivRedSlashHeaderwithGre.description: Generate email template with red slash header and a greybox in the content section, with unordered list in the greybox
emailTemplate:derivRedSlashHeaderwithGre.prompt: Hey, please help to create an HTML email template based on the existing files (deriv-red-slash-header.html and footer-partner.html). Create a complete HTML email template that combines the header and footer with a content section. Write this in email-template.html file. Add a greybox as well in the content section - follow the exact codes in deriv-red-slash-header.mdc and insert unordered list with 3 list items

emailTemplate:weeklyEconomicCalendar_for.description: Replace the data inside the table with the data from the screenshot
emailTemplate:weeklyEconomicCalendar_for.prompt: Refer to the screenshot, please replace the values inside the table with the values in the screenshotted images. Ignore time (GMT-UTC) column.

emailTemplate:sameTemplate_differentCont.description: Keeping the same template, update the content to be different
emailTemplate:sameTemplate_differentCont.prompt: please copy the exact codes from high-leverage-trading-forex-email1.html to maintain the format and style and only change the content according to the image. for image links in the body content, please add placeholder if its not available
